title: How to Get Pichu in Pok√©mon Emerald

steps.title: Go to the Safari Zone, north of Route 121.
steps.content: Go to the Safari Zone, north of Route 121.

steps.title: Catch a Pikachu male and a Pikachu female in the patch of grass west of the first patch you see.
steps.content: Catch a Pikachu male and a Pikachu female in the patch of grass west of the first patch you see.

steps.title: Put both Pikachu in the Daycare west of Mauville City.
steps.content: Put both Pikachu in the Daycare west of Mauville City.

steps.title: Come back later and talk to the daycare man to receive an egg.
steps.content: Come back later and talk to the daycare man to receive an egg.

steps.title: When the egg hatches, it will be a Pichu!
steps.content: When the egg hatches, it will be a Pichu!
